title: Megan McKenna reveals she has been in therapy amid year that saw the death of Mike Thalassitis
text:
Megan McKenna has revealed that she has been in therapy this year after suffering from panic attacks.

It has been a tough few months for the X Factor: Celebrity contestant, 27, and in March, her ex-boyfriend Mike Thalassitis was found hanged in a London park, aged 26, following a cocaine and alcohol binge.

The couple dated on and off throughout 2018, splitting for good last August.

Therapy: Megan McKenna has been in therapy this year after suffering from panic attacks. In March her ex-boyfriend Mike Thalassitis was found hanged (pictured July 2018)

Discussing her experiences in the past few months, Megan told Fabulous magazine: 'Obviously, this year I've had a few little panic attacks.

'I've had therapy, because as much as I have people around me to talk to, speaking to someone I don't really know just helps me to deal with emotions and put things in the right place.'

Megan has not spoken publicly about her grief, yet released a statement on Twitter to offer condolences to Mike's family, two days after his death in March.

Megan wrote at the time: 'Sorry I haven't been on social media but I'm in complete shock and trying to come to terms with this.

'I can't believe I'm even writing this post. My thoughts and prayers are with Mike's family. Rest in peace Mike x'

Coping: Discussing how she has coped in the past few months, Megan told Fabulous magazine: 'Obviously, this year I've had a few little panic attacks' (pictured last week)

Megan is now believed to have been dating Zack Gilbert for the last four months, with a source telling The Sun she has 'been keeping the fledgling romance low-key' following the tragic passing of her ex Mike.

Her reported new flame, 26, is said to have spent half of a decade locked up at a young offenders' institution after an unprovoked attack in a bar in Shoreditch, London.

Despite his brush with the law, Zack has been a 'great source of comfort to her' following Mike's passing.

It is also said that Zack is the first person Megan has dated since Mike and has 'helped to put a smile back on her face.'

'They do seem really happy together, their families have met and everything. He has been going around her house for low key dates rather than going out to all of the places she is used to going to,' it was continued about the reported new romance.

Zack was jailed for five years after holding down a Frenchman in a pub while his pal kicked him repeatedly in the head. According to the victim, the twosome also told him to: 'F*** off, you French c***.'

After his time in the young offenders' unit, Zack has now gone on to start up his own luxury personal shopping service, Affluent Attire.

Meanwhile, Megan is appearing on the Celebrity version of X Factor, in a further bid to kick start her music career following her exit from TOWIE.
